screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .patternlibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: PATTERNLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: Painter provides various tools for creating digital artwork, along with libraries for managing presets. Examples of Painter library file types include .BRUSHLIBRARY , .GRADIENTLIBRARY , and .NOZZLELIBRARY files.

You can manage pattern libraries in Painter through the app's Media Library Panel. To access the patterns, select Window → Media Panels → Patterns . You can then choose to create, import, or export a library with the .patternlibrary file extension.
